reviewText: No problem with these movies and I have watched them a few times. Packaging was as pictured. Used with a Blu-ray player.

I remembered watching Big Business as a kid and laughing hysterically with my friend.  It is still hilarious.

Straight Talk was pretty good too.  Not nearly as funny, but cute.
We learn from these two oustanding actresses how much fun it would be to meet yourself coming and going.  Great fun to watch
Its was a gift for somebody and I wasn't or ask them if they like it or watched it yet

Straight Talk is a great movie... I love Dolly Parton and sometimes, you've got to honk your own horn!

Big Business is hilarious w/ two great comedic actresses!
You can't go wrong with these two movies! I find myself quoting Big Buisness "Your so wispy, wispy, wispy!!"  to "Cow Plop!" It's all lighthearted and funny, and I enjoy them both very much!
Didn't really care for Big Business. But Straight Talk is fabulous. Dolly gives a number one turn as a taxidancer turned call in radio host.
5 stars for Big Business, 2 stars for Straight Talk
I love this move
Good combination of actresses and the films were entertaining
great movies!
I ordered this for my sister.  She loved it.
Thanks
Very pleased.
Big Business has always been one of my favorites. Bette Midler and Lily Tomlin are hilarious.
a great movie for some laughs and a little bit of romance but a whole lot of laughs
Wonderful!
This was brought as a gift for my mom. But I saw a lot of these years ago, and they where good old movies.
Was delivered on time as described in the items description.
My daughter and I loved the movie "Big Business" but didn't really care for "Straight Talk."
great
Two funny movies for a night when you don't want to think, just laugh
We were after "Straight Talk" which we liked. Have not watched the second movie "Big Business" so far.
Great value for money

great actresses and cute stories on both movies.  easy to watch and enjoy
This movie was as advertised.  Packaging was good.  Both movies showed very good no flaws.  This was a good transaction.
Love these movies!

Two of the most underrated comedies of the time, glad to have them at home.

I highly enjoyed the 2 films, because of the learning/humor, and the causes of their family relationships.  And Straight Talk, Dolly Partons' excellent role in it, she was very encouraging about sticking to her "guns".
love both movies
Saw both movies on TV and I wanted it. After waiting for it, there was a big hole in the back of the case so I returned it.
Any movie with Dolly Parton is well worth it!  Quick shipping!
